hibernate-mapping.query: select t from Tela t where t.modulo = :modulo and t.publico = :publico order by t.nome
select t from Tela t where t.nome = :nomeTela and t.modulo.nome = :nomeModulo
select t from Tela t where t.publico = false order by :order
select t from Tela t left join t.perfis p where :perfil in p order by t.nome
